item.title: Need Help With NPC Talking And Energy, Will Add As I Go Along
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

[quote=“Cyclone, post:2, topic:96808”][quote author=X Val X link=topic=139482.msg1340740#msg1340740 date=1179593971]
Hi i’ve just been editing my server trying to make the Dark Mage say “Valentine Is ONLINE” when im online and “Valentine Is OFFLINE” when im offline, however when i log in it says “Valentine Is OFFLINE” and it wont switch to Online…This is what i’ve put…

10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Valentine")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Valentine is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Valentine is OFFLINE"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 797) {

And i want to know how to get unlimited energy for everyone. Post how please and be SPECIFIC

Thanks
[/quote]

Sometimes a simple error … with pimp it takes afew mins for it to take note ur online

For energy u may find it on earthscapepk[/quote]

So if i downloaded earthscapepk i cud take it from that? =\

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With NPC Talking And Energy, Will Add As I Go Along
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

Hi i’ve just been editing my server trying to make the Dark Mage say “Valentine Is ONLINE” when im online and “Valentine Is OFFLINE” when im offline, however when i log in it says “Valentine Is OFFLINE” and it wont switch to Online…This is what i’ve put…

10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Valentine")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Valentine is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Valentine is OFFLINE"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 797) {

And i want to know how to get unlimited energy for everyone. Post how please and be SPECIFIC

Other Help I Need (will add stuff when i need)
-How do i make a bank command or a bank button on the player controls. Either one will do! =)
-How do i edit my shops so i can put what i want in them?
-How do i edit the amount you can buy, like instead of buying 10 runes at a time, put it so you can buy as much as you want. (if its possible)
-How do i fix my special, when i use my g maul spec the bar goes down but when it comes bk up it stays at ‘L’ like … [–SPECIALATTACKS–]-

Read full topic
